problem.p: As a first step Owl plans to build a bridge over to a second tree. What type of bridge should Owl design? This week we'll focus on tension; what types of bridges could Owl design that rely on tension? What design might you propose? Let us know your thoughts.
Type in your answer based on your initial thoughts/instincts.

div.p: We'll be coming back to Owl's Problem a bit later, see you at the end of the learning sequence!
